author: mike
post: Glenn, Jesus did not allow the two on the road to Emmaneus to recognize him on the journey so that He could witness about Himself in all the scriptures. He put a veil on their eyes until He was finished. He still looks the same, albeit cleaned up, but still has the “marks” to show He was ALIVE!!.
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
